verses.verse: LORD, who shall dwell in thy tabernacle? who shall inhabit thy holy mountain?
He that walks uprightly and works righteousness and speaks the truth in his heart.
He that deceives not with his tongue, nor does evil to his neighbor, nor accepts a bribe from his neighbor;
In whose eyes a detestable person is despised; but he honors them that worship the LORD; he that swears to his neighbor and lies not;
He that lends not out his money with interest, nor takes a bribe against the innocent. He that does these things is upright and shall never be moved.
